task.title: Installing Eucalyptus Nightly Packages on CentOS 5

context.p: To install Eucalyptus nightly builds on servers running CentOS 5

step.cmd: Download the Eucalyptus nightly release key from: http://www.eucalyptus.com/eucalyptus-cloud/security/keys
Place the Eucalyptus Nightly GPG key in /etc/pki/rpm-gpg.
